name: BOX (DEMO)
description:
You are in a box. No further information is needed.

You are Red Dude (DEMO NAME). You can run around (eventually) do quests, (one day) unlock pets, and (in the future) visit shops for cosmetics! Maybe one day you can even break out! 

Us here at BOXLabs would prefer if you don't break out. We already have too many sentient simulations. We do NOT need another.

- BOXLabs, creators of the BOX Simulations
